DOC.brief_summary: UMN-0501 purify recombinant influenza HA vaccine ( A H5N1/Vietnam/1203/2004 ) . The purpose present study evaluate immunogenicity , safety optimal dose among three different dos UMN-0501 follow two same-dose vaccination UMN-0501 per patient 3 week interval vaccination healthy young adult . Immunogenicity confirm microneutralization ( MN ) antibody hemagglutination inhibition ( HAI ) titer level serums subject receive different dos UMN-0501 . There three dose group 30 subject per group total 90 healthy young adult age 20-40 year enrol study .
DOC.brief_title: Immunogenicity , Safety Optimal Dose Finding Study Recombinant Influenza H5N1 Vaccine Healthy Young Adults
DOC.criteria: Healthy adult determine medical history , physical examination , laboratory test , clinical judgment investigator . Males female age 2040 year . Provides sign informed consent form receive detailed explanation study protocol prior study procedure . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 30 kg/m2 . Has history A/H5N1 influenza virus infection subject receive A/H5N1 influenza vaccine . Has history allergic reaction food medicine include vaccine , acute fever illness ( great 39.0C ) within 2 day vaccination . Has history GuillainBarre syndrome acute disseminate encephalomyelitis ( ADEM ) . Has severe allergic disease . Has asthma . Has history convulsion . Has history serious disease . Known impairment imune function . Known rheumatism autoimmune disease . Receipt medicine would affect evaluation immunogenicity . Receipt live virus vaccination receipt inactivate vaccine/toxoid prior enrollment . Blood donation prior enrollment . Receipt another investigation agent prior enrollment . History alcohol drug abuse . Females pregnant potentially childbearing breastfeed . Ineligible subject base judgement investigator .
